content:
Efficacy of β blockers in patients with heart failure plus atrial fibrillation: an individual-patient data meta-analysis.Kotecha D, Holmes J, Krum H, Altman DG, Manzano L, Cleland JG, Lip GY, Coats AJ, Andersson B, Kirchhof P, von Lueder TG, Wedel H, Rosano G, Shibata MC, Rigby A, Flather MD; Beta-Blockers in Heart Failure Collaborative Group.Kotecha D, et al.Lancet. 2014 Dec 20;384(9961):2235-43. doi: 10.1016/S0140-6736(14)61373-8. Epub 2014 Sep 2.Lancet. 2014.PMID: 25193873  
Should β-blockers be used in patients with heart failure and atrial fibrillation?Mareev Y, Cleland JG.Mareev Y, et al.Clin Ther. 2015 Oct 1;37(10):2215-24. doi: 10.1016/j.clinthera.2015.08.017. Epub 2015 Sep 29.Clin Ther. 2015.PMID: 26391145 Review.
query: beta-blockers safety profile atrial fibrillation heart failure contraindications bradycardia hypotension
title: Beta-blockers in atrial fibrillation-trying to make sense of unsettling results
reference: Meyer, M., & Lustgarten, D. (2023). Beta-blockers in atrial fibrillation-trying to make sense of unsettling results. Europace, 25(2), 260-262. https://doi.org/10.1093/europace/euad010
